```{r}
View(amazonRatingTypes)
A = (amazonRatingTypes %>% filter(Movie == TRUE))$rating
B = levels(factor(amazonMovies$rating))
if (all(A == B)){
  print("A e B rappresentano i possibili rating types per i film amazon")
}
```
